title: Land with house for sale at Arugam Bay
details:
Land with not finished house for sale Direct at Arugam Bay.
300 meters from ocean.
From 2nd floor possible ocean view.
48 perches.
Acess direct from street.
Clear deeds with bank aproval.
Watter and electricity available.
Calm area.
Flower mark Its possition of land.

Owner is local person, Asanka. If you are interest please call direct to his number, +94777644565.
